entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 7:00 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
